name: Savasana (Corpse Pose)
setup: Lie flat on back on comfortable surface
Legs extended, feet falling naturally outward
Arms at sides, palms facing up
steps: Settle into position with minimal adjustments
Allow body to become heavy and sink into floor
Soften all muscles, release all tension
Rest for 3-10 minutes in complete stillness
mistakes: Letting mind race without gently redirecting
safety: Most accessible relaxation pose. If lower back discomfort, place pillow under knees. If neck uncomfortable, use small pillow or folded towel.

regressions: Supported savasana with bolster under knees
Legs bent, feet flat on floor (constructive rest pose)

prescriptionHints.notes: Final relaxation after yoga, mobility, or any training session. Allow complete physical and mental rest.

joints.notes: Use props (pillow under knees, under head) as needed for comfort. Should feel completely relaxed with zero pain.
